name: @testdeck/core
description: ES6 class syntax testing through decorators interface.
author: Panayot Cankov

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:cjs
scripts.clean: rm -Rf .nyc_output coverage dist *.tgz src/*.js.map src/*.js bin/*.js* test/it/*.js* test/it/fixtures/*.js* test/it/fixtures/packages/*/node_modules
